desc: Helen Anderson was born in Liverpool in the 1940s. She drew and painted from the age of three and by age twelve was making her own clothes. Helen is a true hands-on creative and highly visual.

layout.text: Helen drew and painted from the age of three; by age twelve, she was designing her own extraordinary clothes, often in leather or suede, and frequently hand-painted. Both disciplines have informed her distinguished career as a fine artist and fashion designer.
